AboutPage.heading: About Achhe Code
AboutPage.description: Achhe Code is a technology-driven company focused on building scalable, secure, and future-ready digital solutions for businesses worldwide.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To empower organizations with technology that accelerates innovation, efficiency, and sustainable growth across industries.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We turn complex ideas into reliable, scalable software by combining deep technical expertise with a human-centric approach.

services.title: What We Do
services.description: From automation to AI-driven platforms, we deliver technology solutions that matter.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We act with honesty, transparency, and accountability in everything we do.

innovation.description: We challenge the status quo and continuously push boundaries.

excellence.description: We strive for high-quality outcomes and long-term value creation.
